title: Ripeti Con Me! Review - Is it comparable to Glossika Italian?

media:group.media:title: Ripeti Con Me! Review - Is it comparable to Glossika Italian?
media:group.media:description:
Read my review here: https://www.mezzoguild.com/ripeti-con-me-review/
My Glossika review for comparison: https://www.mezzoguild.com/glossika-review/

I was recently sent a sample of Ripeti Con Me! by Stefano Lodola which I reviewed.
It aims to be a Glossika derivative or improvement so I was keen to see just how close they are (if at all) and raise a few pertinent questions.
Here are my thoughts.
----
For affordable Italian lessons, I recommend: https://www.mezzoguild.com/italki
